Key Match Events: Bebe scored a brilliant long-range free-kick for Cape Verde in their 3-0 win against Mozambique
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cape Verde are currently top of Group B in AFCON after winning their opening two games against Ghana and Mozambique
Others: Bebe currently plays for Real Zaragoza in the Spanish second-tier, on loan from Rayo Vallecano
He has endured a rather nomadic career since playing for Manchester United between 2010 and 2014
